sentences.sContent: Much has changed since my last visit.
sentences.sCn: 自我上次来访后，变化很大。

sentences.sContent: I split up with my last boyfriend three years ago.
sentences.sCn: 我和前任男友在3年前分手了。

sentences.sContent: ...The second trip was made in October last year...
...One of Google's self-driving cars crashed into a bus in California last month...

...The company spent the last five years developing solar panels that are only about a quarter of inch thick and are strong enough to stand up to heavy highway traffic without breaking or making the roads more slippery...
...insists that the answer to that last question is yes...
...A lot has changed since we were last in school...
...There are people who always wait until the last minute...
...Students who put off their work until the last moment often find the exams more difficult than they actually are...
...I'd specifically asked if I could leave early last Friday as I done a lot of overtime during the week...
...The manager told me that Jack Green's been very active around the shop the last few days...

synos.tran: 末尾，最后；上个；鞋楦（做鞋的模型）
最后的；最近的，最新的；仅剩的；最不可能…的
最后地；上次，最近；最后一点

phrases.pCn: 最不想要的事物；最不适宜的事
持续很久，持续很长时间
最后但并不是最不重要的

trans.tranOther: The last event, person, thing, or period of time is the most recent one
